name: webrtc-audio-streamer
description: Minimal WebRTC duplex audio streamer with TTS - laptop to phone, low latency, no app required

scripts.prestart: mkdir -p certs && [ ! -f certs/cert.pem ] && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certs/private-key.pem -out certs/cert.pem -subj '/CN=localhost' 2>/dev/null || true
